results.title: Simvastatin does not normalize very long chain fatty acids in adrenoleukodystrophy mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ does not normalize very long chain fatty acids in @<m>DISEASE_Adrenoleukodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000326 @@@adrenoleukodystrophy@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Cartier N, Guidoux S, Rocchiccioli F, Aubourg P. Simvastatin does not normalize very long chain fatty acids in adrenoleukodystrophy mice. FEBS Lett. 2000 Aug 4;478(3):205-8. PMID: 10930569
citations.BibTeX: @article{10930569, title={Simvastatin does not normalize very long chain fatty acids in adrenoleukodystrophy mice.}, author={Cartier N and Guidoux S and Rocchiccioli F and Aubourg P}, journal={FEBS Lett}, volume={478}, number={3}, pages={205-8}}

results.title: Susceptibility to oxidation of plasma low-density lipoprotein in X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy: effects of simvastatin treatment.
results.text_hl: Susceptibility to oxidation of plasma low-density lipoprotein in @<m>DISEASE_Adrenoleukodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000326 @@@X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy@@@: effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Di Biase A, Salvati S, Varí R, Avellino C, Sforza F, Cappa M, Masella R. Susceptibility to oxidation of plasma low-density lipoprotein in X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy: effects of simvastatin treatment. Mol Genet Metab. 2000 Dec;71(4):651-5. PMID: 11136559
citations.BibTeX: @article{11136559, title={Susceptibility to oxidation of plasma low-density lipoprotein in X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy: effects of simvastatin treatment.}, author={Di Biase A and Salvati S and Varí R and Avellino C and Sforza F and Cappa M and Masella R}, journal={Mol Genet Metab}, volume={71}, number={4}, pages={651-5}}

results.title: Neuroleptic malignant syndrome during zuclopenthixol therapy in X-linked cerebral adrenoleukodystrophy.
results.text_hl: An 8 year-old boy with @<m>DISEASE_Adrenoleukodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000326 @@@X-ALD@@@ under treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ developed a severe adverse reaction when the dose of his other medication, @CHEMICAL_Clopenthixol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003006 @@@zuclopenthixol@@@ was increased.

citations.NLM: Rubio-Gozalbo ME, van Waardenburg DA, Forget PP, Spaapen LJ, Verrips A, Vroomen PC. Neuroleptic malignant syndrome during zuclopenthixol therapy in X-linked cerebral adrenoleukodystrophy. J Inherit Metab Dis. 2001 Oct;24(5):605-6. PMID: 11757591
citations.BibTeX: @article{11757591, title={Neuroleptic malignant syndrome during zuclopenthixol therapy in X-linked cerebral adrenoleukodystrophy.}, author={Rubio-Gozalbo ME and van Waardenburg DA and Forget PP and Spaapen LJ and Verrips A and Vroomen PC}, journal={J Inherit Metab Dis}, volume={24}, number={5}, pages={605-6}}
